titleStmt.title: A proclamacion, set furth by the Kynges maiestie, with the assent and consent of his most dere vncle, Edward Duke of Somerset, Gouernor of his moste royall persone, and of his dominions and subiectes protector, and others of his highnes priuie counsaill, against false tale tellers preachers without licence and such as putteth awaie their wifes and marieth other, duryng their wifes lifes, or suche as kepeth twoo wifes at once, the .xxiiii. daie of Aprill, in the seconde yere of his maiesties most gracious reigne.
Proclamations. 1548-04-24
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)

titleStmt.title: A proclamacion, set furth by the Kynges maiestie, with the assent and consent of his most dere vncle, Edward Duke of Somerset, Gouernor of his moste royall persone, and of his dominions and subiectes protector, and others of his highnes priuie counsaill, against false tale tellers preachers without licence and such as putteth awaie their wifes and marieth other, duryng their wifes lifes, or suche as kepeth twoo wifes at once, the .xxiiii. daie of Aprill, in the seconde yere of his maiesties most gracious reigne.
Proclamations. 1548-04-24
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)
